programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: David Tennant faces a grilling by a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers, from questions about his skincare regime to his cancelled friend.

programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Sara Davies Christmas Craft Off
programme.desc: Tony Maudsley and Hilary Whitehall join Sara Davies for festive crafting - from snow and log cabins to glue gun enthusiasm, chaos, sequins and laughs are guaranteed.

programme.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern for the game show with only one question as Paisley sees if she can beat the infamous Banker.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Working out the words this time are CJ and his dad Caspar from Dorchester, plus siblings Marie and Claire from Craigavon and Will and Helen from London and Bristol.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Its Sandras turn to take on the Banker - join Stephen Mulhern to find out if she takes home a huge cash prize or becomes the latest member of the 1p Club.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Joseph originally from Baltimore, Carol from Bolton, Darryl from London and Kelly from Crewe - work as a team to take on a Chaser.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray and Celia discuss their plans, Dylan is horrified, and Paddy admits how much he misses his dad.

programme.title: The Martin Lewis Money Show Live
programme.desc: Its the final month of 2025, and Martin is back with the financial headlines that matter most to our money, viewers questions, and his ever-informative Big Briefing.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: The pressure mounts as the celebrities hope to make it all the way to the final, but another campmate must pack their bags and say their goodbyes.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Looking for Lingos this time are best mates Tamika and Ollie from Essex and Hertfordshire, couple Amy and Chris from London, and Riccardo and his mum Christiana from Rochdale.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Nikki goes head-to-head with the Banker - tune in to find out if she will take home the jackpot or become the latest member of the 1p Club.

programme.desc: All that stands between Katherine from Guernsey, Kirin from Nottingham, James from London, Charlene from Portstewart and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: April sees no choice, Celia realises that she has a problem on her hands, and Marlon and Rhona are gobsmacked.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Becky hastens to Costellos bedside to cover her tracks, Will overhears Daniel asking Megan on a date, and Dee-Dee refuses to commit to spending Christmas with Ollie.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: Ant and Dec are in Australia with another look at life in the camp - the countdown is now on as the celebrities are into their final days living in the jungle.
